summary: This document is an email from Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley, dated November 11, 2009. The email discusses the timing of Staley's return, and includes a confidentiality notice indicating that the communication may be privileged and confidential.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the sender of the email, reaching out to Jes Staley regarding his return.

persons.name: Jes Staley

keyFacts: The email discusses when Jes Staley will be returning.
The email contains a confidentiality notice indicating it may be attorney-client privileged.
The communication is intended only for the use of the addressee, Jes Staley.
Unauthorized use or disclosure of the email is prohibited.
